document_data.mainbody:
hrysalis was an elven city located within the kingdom of Synnoria on the isle of Gwynneth on the Moonshae Isles.
Chrysalis was secluded within a small valley found between the Cambro Mountains and the Highlands near central Gwynneth.
The city was founded upon a small island in the largest of several lakes found in the valley. Chrysalis was accessible by land by two natural bridgesâ€“one in from the northeast and the other from the southwest.
